name: MTLAttribute
desc: An object that describes an attribute defined in the stage-in argument for a shader.

items.name: var attributeIndex: Int
items.desc: The index of the attribute, as declared in Metal shader source code.

items.name: var attributeType: MTLDataType
items.desc: The data type for the attribute, as declared in Metal shader source code.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the attribute is active.

items.name: var isPatchControlPointData: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the attribute represents control point data.

items.name: var isPatchData: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the attribute represents tessellation patch data.
